Description: Wooden slat with thirteen grooves used for pleating textiles.
Curator's comments: Published: Hall, Egyptian Textiles, (1986), p.52, Fig.40. Hart, Eyewitness Guides: Ancient Egypt, (1990), p.55. Heinrich, Magic of Linen, (Victoria, 1992), p.186.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
